content: I knew about Huizenga and Blockbuster, but I had no idea about Waste Management and Extended Stay. The startup world likes to think of non-tech businesses as not scaling, but how many startup founders do you know who have founded not one, not two, but three (!!!) billion dollar businesses. Surely that puts him in the ranks of the greatest entrepreneurs in history. Incidentally, I wonder what kind of financing sources he used, how long it took him to get to profitability, and what kind of return he was able to give his investors.
